constraint: The arithmetic expression shall only contain numbers (0-9) and arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /).
The arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /) in the arithmetic expression shall not appear consecutively.
result: (forall ((i Int)) (=> (and (>= i 0) (< i (- (seq.len s) 1))) (not (and (or (= (seq.nth s i) "+") (= (seq.nth s i) "-") (= (seq.nth s i) "*") (= (seq.nth s i) "/")) (or (= (seq.nth s (+ i 1)) "+") (= (seq.nth s (+ i 1)) "-") (= (seq.nth s (+ i 1)) "*") (= (seq.nth s (+ i 1)) "/"))))

constraint: Except for the minus sign (-), every operator (+, *, /) in the arithmetic expression shall have a number before and after it.
result: (forall ((i Int)) (=> (and (>= i 0) (< i (str.len s))) (=> (or (= (str.at s i) "+") (= (str.at s i) "*") (= (str.at s i) "/")) (and (not (= (str.at s (- i 1)) " ")) (not (= (str.at s (+ i 1)) " "))))))

constraint: The arithmetic expression shall not start with operators from the set {+, *, /}.
